Adult (lineatus group).description: Red-shouldered Hawks tend to be smaller than Red-tails with a banded tail and warm brown barring below unlike Red-tailed Hawks, which have a mostly unbanded tail and streaks (not barring) below.

Adult light morph.description: Light morph Swainson's Hawks have a dark flight feathers whereas all ages and morphs of Red-tailed Hawks have pale flight feathers.

Adult dark morph.description: Dark morph Swainson's Hawks are more similar to Red-tailed Hawks, but their flight feathers still tend to be darker than Red-tails.

Adult (Northern).description: From a distance a soaring Turkey Vulture might look like a Red-tailed Hawk, but Turkey Vultures have longer, more rectangular wings, which the birds hold above horizontal, forming an easily visible V. Turkey Vultures are also much less steady when they soar.
